TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IProvideCustomContentState

summary.span: 由某类实现，该类需要在离开内容之前将自定义状态添加到内容的导航历史记录条目中。

span.span: Implemented by a class that needs to add custom state to the navigation history entry for content before the content is navigated away from.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以将关联的一条自定义状态，为自定义实现类，与已导航离开的内容的导航历史记录条目。 allows you to associate a piece of custom state, implemented as a custom class, with the navigation history entry for content that has been navigated away from. 自定义状态也可以在这种方式使用以下关联：Custom state can also be associated in this way by using the following: - 调用**AddBackEntry**:Calling **AddBackEntry**: - - - 。. - 设置时引发以下事件之一：Setting when one of the following events are raised: - - - - 必须实现当你自定义将状态添加到导航历史记录通过调用**AddBackEntry**，否则为导航历史记录将无法正常工作; 请考虑以下步骤：You must implement when you add custom state to navigation history by calling **AddBackEntry**, otherwise navigation history will not function correctly; consider the following steps: 1. **AddBackEntry**调用以将自定义状态与当前内容相关联。**AddBackEntry** is called to associate a custom state with the current content. 2. 导航历史记录条目导航回和调用方法的自定义状态，且状态应用于内容。The navigation history entry is navigated back to, and the method of the custom state is called, and the state is applied to the content. 3. 前进导航历史记录中导航到以前的内容。The previous content is navigated to in forward navigation history. 4. 导航历史记录项向后导航，但不是在上次与之关联的导航历史记录条目导航到保留的自定义状态。The navigation history entry is navigated back to, but the custom state has not been retained since the last time the navigation history entry it was associated with was navigated to. 这是默认行为，因为它已添加到导航历史记录后，可能会更改最初在自定义状态中记录的状态。This is the default behavior because the state that is initially recorded in custom state may change after it was added to navigation history. 如果向后导航的自定义状态对象，并应用其状态之前的状态更改的某些方面, 导航历史记录中的项导航到之前, 状态的更改不能会反映在自定义状态对象。If the custom state object is navigated back to and its state is applied, before some aspect about the state changes before the entry in navigation history is navigated to, the change in state cannot be reflected in the custom state object. 此外，无法显式调用以添加新的自定义状态对象，用于反映状态更改。Furthermore, can't be explicitly called to add a new custom state object that reflects the state changes. 因此，以确保当前状态的特定导航始终存储在导航历史记录、调用。Consequently, to ensure the current state for a particular navigation is always stored in navigation history, is called. > [!IMPORTANT] > 信息存储在自定义内容的状态时，无法存储到要为其记住状态的页面的实例的任何引用。When you store information in custom content state, you cannot store any references to the instance of the page for which you are remembering state. 这可以防止[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)]从释放的页实例和破坏了默认导航历史记录行为的用途。This prevents [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] from releasing the page instance, and defeats the purpose of the default navigation history behavior. 如果必须执行此操作，则可以考虑使用相反。If you must do this, you might consider using instead.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState GetContentState() cil managed

summary.span: 返回一个要与导航历史记录中的内容关联的自定义状态类的实例。

span.span: Returns an instance of a custom state class that is to be associated with content in navigation history.

returns.span: 一个要与导航历史记录中的内容关联的自定义 类的实例。

span.span: An instance of a custom class that is to be associated with content in navigation history.
